page.title: 06POTTEN END-THE NURSERY III.
page.content:
ABOUT TWENTY HORSES ARE KEPT. THEY ARE KEPT IN THE FIELDS TO GRAZE,AND SOME ARE USED FOR RIDING,AND DURING THE NIGHT THEY ARE KEPT IN THE STABLES.
THE NURSERY HAS A WIDE VARIETY OF PLANTS-THERE ARE OVER 200 HEATHERS. THERE ARE LOTS OF FRUIT TREES AND SOME HERBS AS WELL AS MANY OTHER TREES AND PLANTS INCLUDING ROSE TREES AND FIR TREES.
THE PLANTS ARE GROWN FROM SAPLINGS,AND WHEN THEY ARE STRONG AND HEALTHY, PEOPLE BUY THEM FROM THT NURSERY. THE NURSERY SHOP ITSELF IS ABOUT 150 YEARS OLD,AND IT USED TO BE A COW SHED. IT SELLS A VARIETY OF THINGS INCLUDNG THE EGGS LAYED BY THE HENS.
THE NURSERY ALSO SELLS RABBITS,AND FISH FROM THEIR OWN POND.
